                   throws PictureNotFoundException
        Returns picture resource from filesystem by identifier and size.
        Parameters:
        id - the picture identifier.
        size - the picture size.
        Returns:
        picture resource bundle.
        Throws:
        PictureNotFoundException - if picture not found in filesystem.
